```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(here)

```

```{r}

source(here::here("src", "storm_runoff.R"))

```

```{r}

impervious_fraction <- seq(from = 0.6, to = 0.8, by = 0.01)
watershed_runoff <- predict_runoff(impervious_fraction, 182)

runoff_df <- data.frame(impervious_fraction, watershed_runoff)

```

```{r}

predicted_runoff_plot <- ggplot(data = runoff_df,
       (aes(x = impervious_fraction, y = watershed_runoff))) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  theme_minimal() + 
  labs(title = "Predicted Watershed Runoff Volume",
       x = "Impervious Fraction",
       y = "Volume of Stormwater (ft^3)")

ggsave(here::here("figs", "predicted_runoff_plot.png"), height = 6, width = 7)

```
